jobDescription: Job #: 862965  Apex Systems is currently looking for a Data Analyst Admin who will sit in Benton Harbor, MI or South Bend, Indiana. If interested, please submit your resume to klaughlin@apexsystems.com. Description - Coordinate the gathering of information by the running of queries and reports between the field technicians and coordinators. - Manage the data in numerous databases to insure the quality and integrity of the data. - Track and analyze data. - Maintain continuous Improvement of maintenance procedures and guidelines. - Assist with the facilitation, coordination, communication/documentation, refinement, initiation and tracking of projects and programs. - Solicit information via phone and email. Required Skills • Microsoft Excel • Microsoft Outlook • Ability to solicit information from field employees via phone call, email, texts etc. • Ability to organize and summarize data • Ability to follow up on data requests and other tasks Preferred Skills • Microsoft Access • Electric Utility Background would be a plus • Ability to analyze and read schematics
